result.name: newquay-and-the-gannel-marine-conservation-zone-mcz-survey-data
result.notes:
One survey of Newquay and the Gannel rMCZ site have been completed to date 
(Apr 2015):

Cruise: EA_sngn0213

Date: 21st March - 31st March 2013

Data collected:

MB Bathymetry Coverage (Contractor): None acquired to date

MB Backscatter Coverage (Contractor): None acquired to date

SS Coverage: None acquired to date

Video and Stills Samples to date: 62 video transects (video anot analysed); 
293 stills analyses (EA_sngn0213) - Usable

PSA Samples to date: 41

Infauna Samples to date: 41

organization.description: MEDIN is a partnership of UK organisations committed to improving access to marine data. Our partners are both public and private sector.
